zone.line: The Excellent impostors of this Earth
When they outface detection — he had worth
Poor fellow, though a humorist in his way.
Alas what drove him mad? I cannot say.
when
A lady came with him from France, and
She left him & returned, he wandered then
yon
About the lonely isles of desert sand
wild
Till he grew mad._ he had no cash or land
Remaining — so I h I hired him apartments there

line.del: Open to the sea, and gave him to the care

zone.line: the watchmen
and the some soldiers brought him here
Some fancy took him & he wd. not bear
Removal — so I hired him a
so I fitted up some rooms for
him

line.del: Facing the sea thus flattering his fond whim

zone.line: Those rooms beside the seat to please his whim
And sent him books & busts & urns for flowers
And instruments of music hours
Things which had soothed his life in happier
